content: drops christmas crochet drops gingerbread house pot holder in 2 strands safran and paris drops extra 0-987 drops design pattern no e-218 yarn group a + a large gingerbread house measurements width approx 23 cm / 9 height approx 23 cm / 9 from roof top materials drops safran from garnstudio 100 g color no 22 light brown and use drops paris from garnstudio 50 g color no 17 off white and some left-overs of color no 12 red color no 13 orange color no 10 dark turquoise color no 39 pistachio small gingerbread house measurements width approx 15 cm / 6 height approx 16 cm / 6 1/4 materials drops safran from garnstudio 50 g color no 22 light brown and use drops paris from garnstudio 50 g color no 17 off white and some left-overs of color no 12 red color no 13 orange color no 10 dark turquoise color no 39 pistachio drops crochet hook size 4 mm / g/6 or size needed to get 20 single_crochet x 18 row = 4 x 4 10 x 10 cm with 2 strands safran work front and back on roof first then front and back on house uk version 1 1 http //www garnstudio com/pattern php id=6386&cid=19
